meanings.sent1: The tiny insect was unapparent to the naked eye.
meanings.sent2: The solution to the puzzle was unapparent at first glance.
meanings.sent3: It was unapparent why the cat was afraid of the harmless butterfly.
meanings.sent4: The true meaning behind her words remained unapparent to him.
meanings.sent5: The unapparent danger lurking in the shadows caught them by surprise.

meanings.sent1: The unapparent reason for his absence puzzled his friends.
meanings.sent2: Her talent was unapparent until she started singing.
meanings.sent3: The unapparent shortcut through the forest saved them a lot of time.
meanings.sent4: The unapparent connection between the two events became clear later.
meanings.sent5: The unapparent beauty of the old painting was revealed under the restoration.
